name: Astronomy in Colombia
body:
## Welcome to the Colombian Astronomy web page:

In this site you will find all kind of information involving astronomy in Colombia, such as: Colombian 
professional astronomers, Research groups, students and some News. 

## Professional astronomers: 

- A full list of professional astronomers (Professors and Postdocs) working in Colombia 
can be found here: https://github.com/ColombianAstronomy/ProductividadAstronomica/blob/master/ADS_stats_colombia.csv

- A full list of Colombian astronomers working as Postdocs all over the world can be found at: 
https://github.com/ColombianAstronomy/ProductividadAstronomica/blob/master/ADS_stats_postdocs.csv

## Research Groups:

A full lists of the astronomy research groups can be found here:

https://github.com/ColombianAstronomy/ResearchGroups

## Students:

Colombian astronomy students have their on network RECA (Red de Estudiantes Colombianos en Astronom√≠a), 
Where they share astronomy news, summer research opportunities, Msc and Phd Positions and events. 

- Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/RECAstronomia
- Official site: https://sites.google.com/site/recastronomia/ 

## Colombian Astronomical Events:

- http://eventoscolombianosenciencias.com/ECC/Astronomia2015.html

## News:

Since 2015 every month a publication with astronomy news is released, you can look at them here:
https://github.com/recanews.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
